Footer.footerText: The leading post-purchase solution for DTC eCommerce brands.

Index.title: Home
Index.BuiltForPeaceTitle: Built for your peace of mind
Index.OutBoxText: "Simplicity equals respect", ParcelPanel empowers your brand in just a few minutes, with no need for coding or complex operations.
Index.SupportText: ParcelPanel offers world-class customer service. Whether it's product usage, onboarding, or migration, if you have any questions, we're here to assist you anytime, anywhere.
Index.IndexInfo: After-sales is no longer just an afterthought. ParcelPanel post-purchase solution reduces your after-sales costs while keeping your customers satisfied and driving revenue conversion.

TryFree.title: Try ParcelPanel Free

TryFree.desc1: An all-in-one customer service platform that helps you balance everything your customers need to be happy.
TryFree.desc2: Deliver has sle-free return and enticing exchange experience to minimize losses, reduce friction, and retain revenue.
